mapper.select: SELECT m_calendar_id, member_num, regdate, memo FROM membercalendar WHERE member_num = #{ member_num} ORDER BY m_calendar_id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO membercalendar (m_calendar_id, member_num, regdate, memo) VALUES (m_calendar_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{ member_num}, TO_DATE(#{regdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{ memo})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM (SELECT member_num, m_calendar_id FROM membercalendar WHERE member_num = #{member_num}) WHERE m_calendar_id = #{m_calendar_id}
